metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19886 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
Trustwave ModSecurity 3.0.0 through 3.0.3 allows an attacker to sendcrafted requests that may, when sent quickly in large volumes, lead to theserver becoming slow or unresponsive (Denial of Service) because of a flawin Transaction::addRequestHeader in transaction.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19886` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmodsecurity3 - 3.0.4-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: modsecurity package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-1').
